alert.note: Alert for Fajardo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued November 08 at 10:47AM AST until November 08 at 11:15AM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AST TODAY... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive runoff. * WHERE...Fajardo. * WHEN...Until noon AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Dangerous flows over low-water crossings. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Some low-water crossings may become impassable. River or stream flows are elevated. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1043 AM AST, emergency management reported ongoing flooding affecting roads PR-3 near Puerto del Rey and PR-194 near intersection with PR-3. This is causing urban and small stream flooding, with portions of these roads impassable. Between 1 and 5 inches of rain have fallen.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
